definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

pinyin: Si1 luo4 wen2 ni2 ya4 Gong4 he2 guo2
Si1 luo4 wen2 ni2 ya4 yu3

sentences.english: This story is a sort of a thriller, which is quite unusual for Slovene films.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个对斯洛文尼亚电影来说很不寻常的惊悚故事。

sentences.english: Eight years later the Slovenian rower also brought home a gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 八年后，这名斯洛文尼亚选手又为祖国赢得一枚金牌。

sentences.english: Slovenia has so far taken delivery of 24 AFVs from Patria and is due to purchase a further three units in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里亚迄今已向斯洛文尼亚交付了24架AFV。

sentences.english: Slovenia has warned its nationals not to travel to Japan unless necessary.
sentences.chinese: 斯洛文尼亚提醒国民，若非必要，应避免前往日本。

sentences.english: The site plot is in the industrial area of Skofja Loka, Slovenia.
sentences.chinese: 该地块位于斯洛文尼亚什科菲亚洛卡工业区。

sentences.english: A fern is seen on the bank of river Mura near the village of Izakovci, in east Slovenia.
sentences.chinese: 斯洛文尼亚东部，穆拉河岸的蕨草。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Slovenia?
The above video comes courtesy of Radio-Television of Slovenia.
sentences.chinese: 上面的视频由斯洛文尼亚的广播电视台诚意推荐。

sentences.english: A mass grave from the end of World War II has been discovered in Slovenia.
sentences.chinese: 斯洛文尼亚境内发现二战末期的一个乱葬冈。

definition: abbr. for 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4] Bosnia and Herzegovina
